dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT REPLACE(:CUSTOMERID, 'SCOULAR.', '') cust_id, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY HH:MI PM') sys_date FROM DUAL

SELECT tab1.contract, tab1.commodity, tab1.destination_port, tab1.mt_weight, tab1.mt_applied, tab1.boxes, ipc.contact_xid customer, cust.location_name customer_name, tab1.begin_sail, tab1.end_sail, tab2.booking, tab2.load_port, tab2.bkg_dest_port, tab2.carrier, tab2.voyage_name, tab2.voyage_number, tab2.est_mt_weight, tab2.est_boxes, tab2.applied_mt, tab2.applied_boxes, tab2.ship_date, tab2.arrival_date FROM (SELECT a.order_base_gid, a.contract, a.commodity, a.destination_port, a.mt_weight, a.begin_sail, a.end_sail, a.mt_applied, a.boxes FROM (SELECT ob.order_base_gid, ob.order_base_xid contract, obr.ob_refnum_value commodity, loc.location_name destination_port, (CASE WHEN obl.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(obl.early_pickup_date, 'MM/DD/YY') ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(obl.early_pickup_date,obl.source_location_gid),'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YY') END) begin_sail, (CASE WHEN obl.dest_location_gid IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(obl.late_delivery_date, 'MM/DD/YY') ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(obl.late_delivery_date,obl.dest_location_gid),'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YY') END) end_sail, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(AVG(ROUND(COALESCE(obl.weight_base / 2204.5855379, 0), 3)), 0), '999,999,990')) mt_weight, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(ROUND(( CASE WHEN (SELECT ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref WHERE ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER ID') IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ssu.unit_net_weight_base END / 2204.5855379), 3)), '999,999,990.999')) mt_applied, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(CASE WHEN (SELECT ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref WHERE ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER ID') IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END),'999,999,990')) boxes FROM ob_order_base ob INNER JOIN ob_line obl ON ob.order_base_gid = obl.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON obl.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON obr.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssul.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT s1.shipment_gid FROM shipment s1 INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s1.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid AND TO_DATE(s1.port_discharge_eta) - TO_DATE(CURRENT_DATE) >= -2) GROUP BY ob.order_base_gid, ob.order_base_xid, obr.ob_refnum_value, loc.location_name, (CASE WHEN obl.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(obl.early_pickup_date, 'MM/DD/YY') ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(obl.early_pickup_date,obl.source_location_gid),'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YY') END), (CASE WHEN obl.dest_location_gid IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(obl.late_delivery_date, 'MM/DD/YY') ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(obl.late_delivery_date,obl.dest_location_gid),'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YY') END) ) a ) tab1 INNER JOIN (SELECT b.order_base_gid, b.booking, b.load_port, b.bkg_dest_port, b.carrier, b.voyage_name, b.voyage_number, b.est_mt_weight, b.est_boxes, b.applied_mt, b.applied_boxes, b.ship_date, b.arrival_date FROM (SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_gid, sref.shipment_refnum_value booking, loc1.location_name load_port, loc2.location_name bkg_dest_port, SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,1,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') -1) carrier, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') +1, LENGTH(s.shipment_name) -1),1,INSTR(SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') +1, LENGTH(s.shipment_name) -1),'|') -1) voyage_name, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') +1, LENGTH(s.shipment_name) -1),INSTR(SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') +1, LENGTH(s.shipment_name) -1),'|') + 1,LENGTH(SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') +1, LENGTH(s.shipment_name) -1)) -1) voyage_number, TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'MM/DD/YY') ship_date, TO_CHAR(s.port_discharge_eta, 'MM/DD/YY') arrival_date, SUM(ROUND(((CASE WHEN (SELECT ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref WHERE ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER ID') IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE ssu.unit_net_weight_base END) / 2204.5855379), 3)) est_mt_weight, SUM((CASE WHEN (SELECT ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref WHERE ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER ID') IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END)) Est_Boxes, SUM(ROUND(((CASE WHEN (SELECT ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref WHERE ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER ID') IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ssu.unit_net_weight_base END) / 2204.5855379), 3)) applied_mt, SUM((CASE WHEN (SELECT ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref WHERE ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER ID') IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END)) applied_boxes FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BOOKING ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid WHERE NOT s.port_discharge_eta IS NULL GROUP BY oob.order_base_gid, sref.shipment_refnum_value, loc1.location_name, loc2.location_name, SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,1,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') -1), SUBSTR(SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') +1, LENGTH(s.shipment_name) -1),1,INSTR(SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') +1, LENGTH(s.shipment_name) -1),'|') -1), SUBSTR(SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') +1, LENGTH(s.shipment_name) -1),INSTR(SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') +1, LENGTH(s.shipment_name) -1),'|') + 1,LENGTH(SUBSTR(s.shipment_name,INSTR(s.shipment_name,'|') +1, LENGTH(s.shipment_name) -1)) -1), TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'MM/DD/YY'), TO_CHAR(s.port_discharge_eta, 'MM/DD/YY') ORDER BY 1,2,3 ) b ) tab2 ON tab1.order_base_gid = tab2.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_involved_party obip ON tab1.order_base_gid = obip.order_base_gid AND obip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' INNER JOIN contact ipc ON obip.involved_party_contact_gid = ipc.contact_gid INNER JOIN location cust ON ipc.location_gid = cust.location_gid WHERE ipc.contact_gid = :CUSTOMERID AND obip.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' ORDER BY tab1.contract, tab1.begin_sail, tab1.end_sail, tab2.booking, tab2.ship_date, tab2.arrival_date
